meanings.definition: Extremely poor or of low quality.
meanings.sent1: The shittiest movie I've ever seen had terrible acting and a confusing plot.
meanings.sent2: This is the shittiest sandwich I've ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: Even my dog refused to eat the shittiest dog food brand.
meanings.sent4: The shittiest weather ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: The shittiest hotel room had broken furniture and dirty sheets.

meanings.sent1: The shittiest part of the trip was when it rained every day.
meanings.sent2: I had the shittiest experience at the dentist's office yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The shittiest smell came from the garbage bin after a week of not emptying it.
meanings.sent4: The shittiest news I heard all week was about the upcoming layoffs at work.
meanings.sent5: The shittiest taste in my mouth was from accidentally drinking spoiled milk.

meanings.sent1: The shittiest outcome of the game was losing by a huge margin.
meanings.sent2: This is the shittiest gift I've ever received.
meanings.sent3: The shittiest parking spot was right next to the overflowing trash cans.
meanings.sent4: The shittiest decision I made was to go out without an umbrella in the pouring rain.
meanings.sent5: The shittiest time to get a flat tire was in the middle of nowhere at night.
